output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, CMF 11240002 is present, indicating this is electoral content.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions Nicolae CiucÄƒ multiple times, who is one of the presidential candidates (Position 4).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement targeting 500,001-1,000,000 people on Facebook and Instagram.
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clear electoral objective: - Directly promotes CiucÄƒ for president ("Nicolae CiucÄƒ, preÈ™edinte!ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡´") - Makes campaign promises ("RomÃ¢nia va avea parte de stabilitate, respect È™i dezvoltare") - Explicitly calls for electoral support ("Este extrem de important pe cine alegem sÄƒ fie preÈ™edintele RomÃ¢niei")
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is a structured campaign message with CMF number and clear campaign objectives.
This is a clear violation of Article 55 t) as it: - Continues electoral propaganda after the conclusion of the campaign period - Is actively running after the legal end of the presidential campaign - Has significant reach (3,000-3,999 impressions) - Contains explicit electoral messaging

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official campaign identifier (CMF) - Explicitly promotes a presidential candidate - Makes campaign promises - Calls for electoral support - Uses paid distribution channels - Targets a wide audience
